entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
